SPONSORS
Sponsors and Supporters
Project Sponsors
Project Sponsors, help to contribute to the sustainability of the project through financial sponsorship as part of the project sponsorship program. All proceedes go to cover operational and outreach costs for the project and related initiatives.
Inagural Project Sponsors - Read the Announcement
Gold
Trend Micro, a global cybersecurity leader, leverages decades of security expertise, research, and innovation to help make the world safe for exchanging digital information.
Gold
ByteDance is a technology company known for developing innovative content platforms powered by artificial intelligence. Founded in 2012, ByteDance is best known for TikTok (international) and Douyin (China), short-video platforms
Gold
HiddenLayer, a Gartner-recognized Cool Vendor for AI Security, is the leading provider of Security for AI. Its security platform helps enterprises safeguard the machine learning models behind their most important
Gold
Palo Alto Networks is the global cybersecurity leader, committed to making each day safer than the one before with industry-leading, AI-powered solutions in network security, cloud security and security operations
Gold
Snyk is the leader in developer security, empowering developers to build secure applications and equip security teams to meet the demands of the digital world.
Gold
Mend.io offers an enterprise suite of application security tools designed to help leading organizations build and manage mature AppSec programs, enabling them to stop chasing vulnerabilities and start proactively managing
Silver
SplxAI is the global leader in AI red teaming – automating security testing for AI systems to uncover vulnerabilities, ensure compliance, and safeguard AI apps and agents across the development
View
Silver
Acuvity is the leading provider of Runtime GenAI Security Platform. With its GenAI-native platform, Acuvity enables enterprises to increase productivity and gain competitive advantage via the use of GenAI.
View
Silver
Lakera is the world’s leading real-time GenAI security company. The company created Gandalf, an educational tool, where more than one million users have learned about AI security. Lakera uses AI
View
Silver
Protecto provides AI data guardrails to prevent sensitive data leaks, privacy breaches, and compliance risks in AI/LLM use cases while preserving data context and ensuring AI accuracy.
View
Silver
ActiveFence helps you create trusted and secure AI experiences with the data, expertise, and guardrails for deployment-ready models and safe enterprise applications.
View
Silver
TrojAI is an enterprise-grade AI security platform that protects the behavior of AI/ML and GenAI models and applications at build time and run time.
View
Silver
Cobalt enables organizations to reduce risk and thrive in a secure future with an offensive security approach to identifying and addressing cyber threats.
View
Silver
Pangea helps organizations ship secure AI applications quickly with the industry's broadest set of AI security guardrails added with just a few lines of code.
View
Silver
Prompt Security empowers organizations to safely and securely adopt Generative AI by protecting from all GenAI-related risks across applications, employees and customers.
View
Silver
Synack’s Penetration Testing as a Service platform manages customers’ attack surfaces by discovering assets, pentesting for vulnerabilities and gaining visibility into security risks’ root causes.
View
Silver
Lasso Security is a pioneering comprehensive Large Language Models (LLMs) cybersecurity solution that is committed to addressing the evolving threats and challenges that businesses are beginning to encounter with Generative
View
Silver
Securiti is the pioneer of the Data Command Center, a centralized platform that enables the safe use of data and AI
View

Supporting Organizations
Supporting organization provide reasources and contributions as part of the project development overall and support the goals of the project.
